title: Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders
tags: solve the open hand temple murders
content:
Gortash's influence, she fears that if the murder was committed by a refugee, the Flaming Fist might cease refugee aid. Respond to her concerns with:

Committing to help by investigating to prove Brilgor's innocence. Recognizing the ongoing need to assist Baldur's Gate residents. Expressing your view that the temple should concentrate on spiritual matters. Choosing to depart from the conversation.

Choose the first option to update the quest "Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders." Yannis allows yo
